301611943.Title: Electrolux 8.0 cu. ft. Electric Dryer in White, ENERGY STAR
301611943.Description: Electrolux Laundry introduces a dryer designed to keep clothes looking their best. The 8.0 cu. ft. Front Load Electric Dryer boasts special features to keep you favorite garments well cared for. Options include 5 dry cycles for all fabric types, LED Display, reversible door and ENERGY STAR Certification. Color: White.

100089048.Title: GE 3.6 cu. ft. 120-Volt White Stackable Electric Vented Stationary Compact Dryer
100089048.Description: The GE Spacemaker 3.6 cu. ft. Stationary Electric Dryer features a sound reduction system to help provide quiet operation and a DuraDrum for long-lasting use. The dryer has a 3.6 cu. ft. capacity and a compact design to help save space. The dryer features 3 dry cycles that include cotton, timed dry and quick fluff to help efficiently dry your clothes. The dryer is stackable for your convenience and is UL listed for safety. Color: White.

308241998.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt Stackable Chrome Shadow Electric Ventless Dryer with Intuitive Touch Controls, ENERGY STAR
308241998.Description: Match your family's routines and your space with a front load hybrid heat pump dryer that can be installed virtually anywhere. Thanks to its ventless design. Dry each load your way in this ENERGY STAR certified dryer with our most efficient full-size dryer technology that recirculates hot air to help conserve energy. Color: Chrome Shadow.

207024881.Title: LG Electronics 5.2 cu. ft. HE Mega Capacity Front Load Washing Machine with Steam and TurboWash in Graphite Steel, ENERGY STAR
207024881.Description: Imagine being able to wash a king size comforter and a full set of bedding in a single load. And just think how much more amazing this would be if you could tackle a regular load of laundry 20 minutes faster. Stop imagining and go for it. LG takes the industry's largest capacity washer and powers it to the max with time-saving TurboWash technology and a steam cleaning feature that virtually eliminates dirt, wrinkles and odors. Color: Graphite Steel.

307760461.Title: GE 4.1 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Ventless Dryer, ENERGY STAR
307760461.Description: The GE 4.1 cu. ft. Ventless Condenser Frontload Electric Dryer has 4 heat selections and 13 dry cycles for flexibility and enhanced drying performance. An ideal choice for your home, this dryer has a delay start option for setting the dryer according to your schedule and a Sensor Dry system that monitors moisture levels and helps keep clothes looking their best. The dryer's Stainless-Steel drum has a smooth surface to help prevent rust and protect clothes. Color: White.

307685530.Title: Samsung 4.0 cu. ft. Capacity White 24 Stackable Electric Ventless Heat Pump Dryer ENERGY STAR Certified
307685530.Description: This Samsung ventless heat pump dryer comes with advanced features like Smart Care that allow you to troubleshoot straight from your phone. Sensor Dry optimizes cycle time and temperature to dry thoroughly while protecting your clothes. ENERGY STAR certified, so you can save money by conserving energy. Independently evaluated against strict specifications and is proven to save energy without sacrificing performance or functionality. Color: White.

206984124.Title: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Steam in Black Stainless, ENERGY STAR, Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel
206984124.Description: This Samsung Electric Dryer is an eco-friendly, 2016 ENERGY STAR-certified dryer with 14 preset drying cycles. It features a large 7.5 cu. ft. capacity that allows you to quickly do more laundry in a single load. Best of all, you'll spend less time ironing and less money at the dry cleaner's with the Multi-Steam feature that helps remove wrinkles and odors while freshening your clothes. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel.

207102720.Title: LG Electronics 4.2 cu. ft. White Compact Stackable Front Load Electric Ventless Dryer with Sensor Dry
207102720.Description: As a leader in smart technology and stylish design, LG introduces a new 24 in. compact condensing ventless dryer. The ventless condensing system dries clothes without the need for external venting. This dryer is perfect for apartments, condos or small spaces. Color: White.

206870872.Title: Samsung 24 in. 4.0 cu. ft. Electric Vented Dryer in White
206870872.Description: The Samsung 24 in. laundry is the perfect mixture of both size, style and function. At only 24 in. wide, this dryer will fit in the tightest quarters. In addition, it features twelve cycle settings, including Sensor Dry, which automatically turns off as soon as your clothes are dry. It also comes with Smart Care, which lets you troubleshoot any issues right from your smartphone. Color: White.

203576349.Title: Whirlpool 3.4 cu. ft. 120-Volt White Compact Electric Vented Dryer with Flexible Installation
203576349.Description: Do laundry at your convenience with a 120V compact dryer that fits in more places and adapts to your space. Flexible installation options allow you to mount the small dryer where you need it, making it an ideal apartment dryer. Help prevent overdrying with AccuDry sensor drying technology that senses when clothes are done and stops the cycle. Color: White.

304419743.Title: Samsung 4.0 cu. ft. Electric Vented Dryer in Gray, Inox Gray
304419743.Description: Advanced features like Smart Care allow you to troubleshoot straight from your phone. Sensor Dry optimizes cycle time and temperature to dry thoroughly while protecting your clothes. 14 preset dry cycles make it easy to give each fabric type the right care. Color: Inox Gray.

311972499.Title: GE 7.8 cu. ft. Smart 240-Volt Satin Nickel Stackable Electric Vented Dryer with Steam and Sanitize Cycle, ENERGY STAR

100091470.Title: GE 3.6 cu. ft. 120-Volt White Stackable Electric Vented Portable Compact Dryer
100091470.Description: The GE Spacemaker 3.6 cu. ft. Portable Electric Dryer features a sound reduction system to help provide quiet dryer operation. The manual controls offer easy use and the DuraDrum helps provide durability. The dryer features 3 dry cycles and 3 heat selections to help deliver efficient drying results. The dryer features a portable and stackable design to help provide versatility and is UL listed for safety. Color: White.

308184645.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Stackable Electric Dryer with Steam and Intuitive Touch Controls, ENERGY STAR
308184645.Description: Care never stops. That's why Whirlpool front load dryers help you do laundry in a way that fits your family's routines. Create customized cycles for whatever you're drying in just a few touches with Intuitive Controls. The WrinkleShield Plus option with Steam helps keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics after the cycle ends. Color: White.

301135032.Title: Magic Chef Compact 3.5 cu. ft. Electric Dryer in White
301135032.Description: Small space? No problem This Magic Chef compact 3.5 cu. ft. electric dryer is perfect for limited spaces. It features a space-saving design that can be wall mounted or placed on a countertop. This machine is suitable for apartments, dorms and RVs. It's equipped with three temperature settings, ensuring options for proper fabric care. Designed with a stainless steel tub, this compact dryer uses a standard 110-volt outlet so there is no need for special wiring. Color: White.

311972503.Title: GE 7.8 cu. ft. Smart 240-Volt Diamond Gray Stackable Electric Vented Dryer with Steam and Sanitize Cycle, ENERGY STAR
311972503.Description: GE appliances provides up-to-date technology and exceptional quality to simplify the way you live. With a timeless appearance, this family of appliances is ideal for your family. And, coming from one of the most trusted names in America, you know that this entire selection of appliances is as advanced as it is practical. Color: Diamond Gray.

316457781.Title: LG Electronics 4.2 cu. ft. Compact Front Load White Electric Dryer with Dual Inverter HeatPump Technology
316457781.Description: This sleek dryer offers big style and big capacity in a small 24 in. wide footprint, with a go-anywhere ventless design that can be installed side by side or stacked on top of a compact LG washer. But saving space is just the beginning-LG's innovative HeatPump technology saves energy with the dryer usage on every load*. Unlike conventional condenser ventless dryers that extract the moisture from clothes and pumps it out of the dryer, this dryer extracts the moisture and recycles it for more energy-efficient drying, every day. *When compared with comparable ventless dryer using condenser heating technology, based on Intertek testing in normal cycle, 8.45 lb. load-standard load for compact dryer, comparing Heat Pump Dryer DLHC1455W vs. Condenser Heater Dryer DLEC888W (January 2021). Drying times might be longer when compared with vented dryers. Color: White.

308239897.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Dryer with Intuitive Touch Controls and Advanced Moisture Sensing, ENERGY STAR
308239897.Description: Care never stops. That's why Whirlpool front load dryers help you do laundry in a way that fits your family's routines. Create customized cycles for whatever you're drying in just a few touches with Intuitive Controls. Advanced Moisture Sensing ends the cycle at just the right time to help prevent over drying. Color: White.

315280946.Title: Bosch 500-Series 4 cu. ft. 240-Volt Home Connect White Stackable Electric Ventless Heat Pump Compact Dryer, ENERGY STAR
315280946.Description: The 500-Series heat pump dryer with a self-cleaning condenser is America's most efficient dryer. The self-cleaning condenser doesn't require any maintenance and ensures a lint-free condenser. Spacious and efficient, Bosch's compact 24 in. ventless dryer seamlessly integrates into any laundry space either stacked or side-by-side. With the Home Connect app, receive cycle status notifications or remote start your dryer all from your smartphone. Color: White.

308705002.Title: Panda 1.50 cu. ft. White and Black Electric Compact Portable Laundry Dryer
308705002.Description: The Panda 1.50 cu. ft. mini Compact Dryer is a space-saving design which makes your laundry easy and simple. It is compact which is perfect for smaller laundry loads, you can use it in apartment, dorms, RVs, and it also can be the second dryer in your house. It features a large see-through window. Stainless Steel drum is durable and resists rust and chipping. It has a removable interior lint filter and a user-friendly control panel. Choose drying time, from 20 to 200 minutes. A wall-hanging bracket comes included, can be wall mounted. Regular 3 prongs 110 Voltage can be plugged anywhere, 850-Watt of the motor rate which may take a little longer to dry the clothes, but it saves the electricity bills. Color: White.

310778385.Title: Haier 4.1 cu. ft. Smart 240 Volt White Stackable Electric Ventless Dryer, ENERGY STAR
310778385.Description: GE appliances provide up-to-date technology and exceptional quality to simplify the way you live. With a timeless appearance, this family of appliances is ideal for your family. And, coming from one of the most trusted names in America, you know that this entire selection of appliances is as advanced as it is practical. Color: White.

308692728.Title: GE 4.3 cu. ft. 240 Volt White Electric Dryer with Stainless Steel Basket, ENERGY STAR
308692728.Description: The GE 4.3 cu. ft. Electric Dryer has 4 heat selections and 13 dry cycles for flexibility and enhanced drying performance. An ideal choice for your home, this dryer has a delay start option for setting the dryer according to your schedule and a Sensor Dry system that monitors moisture levels and helps keep clothes looking their best. The dryer's Stainless steel drum has a smooth surface to help prevent rust and protect clothes and its reversible dryer door offers installation flexibility. Color: White.

304701229.Title: Electrolux 8.0 cu. ft. Front Load Perfect Steam Electric Dryer with LuxCare Dry and Instant Refresh in White
304701229.Description: The Electrolux Perfect Steam electric dryer with LuxCare Dry system protects fabrics by safely and fully drying clothes. Remove wrinkles and quickly refresh items with steam in 10 minutes with Instant Refresh cycle. Quickly dry the items you need most with the 18-Minute Fast Dry. Color: White.

312980603.Title: GE 7.8 cu. ft. Smart 240 Volt White Stackable Electric Vented Dryer with Long Vent and Sanitize Cycle, ENERGY STAR
312980603.Description: At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home. Color: White.

316130016.Title: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. 240-Volt Brushed Black Electric Dryer with Smart Dial and Super Speed Dry, ENERGY STAR
316130016.Description: Samsung's new Smart Dial Dryer uses AI power to learn and recommend your favorite drying cycles and displays them first for quick access in a simplified, easy-to-use control panel. You can also dry a full load of laundry in just 30-minutes with Super Speed Dry and eliminate 99.9% of germs and bacteria on clothing with Steam Sanitize. Samsung's AI Powered Smart Dial learns and recommends your favorite drying cycles and allows you to operate the dryer right from the washer when the units are stacked. Based on using Super Speed cycle with an 8 lbs. load. Based on internal testing and independently verified by Intertek. Individual results may vary. Operating dryer from washer requires DVMCK/A1, which is sold separately. Color: Brushed Black.

207197191.Title: DECO 3.5 cu. ft. Compact Standard Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry, Refresh Function and Automatic Wrinkle Guard, White
207197191.Description: Style and function meet in this 3.5 cu. ft. compact standard electric dryer. Boasting a variety of innovative features to keep up with an active lifestyle, this sleek, stable vented dryer comes equipped with three programmable levels of sensor drying. It includes pause on command, protects against wrinkles and features child-lock protection. With a 180-degree door swing, high-speed turbo fan, fresh function and overheating protection, this modern dryer can be easily raised 2.25 in. to meet the height of your washer. The machine is topped with a white premium finish and silver trim.

308184390.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240-Volt Chrome Shadow Stackable Electric Dryer with Steam and Wrinkle Shield Plus Option, ENERGY STAR
308184390.Description: Care never stops. That's why Whirlpool front load dryers help you do laundry in a way that fits your family's routines. Create customized cycles for whatever you're drying in just a few touches with Intuitive Controls. The WrinkleShield Plus option with Steam helps keep wrinkles from setting into clean, dry fabrics after the cycle ends. Color: Chrome Shadow.

304691910.Title: Electrolux 8.0 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Steam, Predictive Dry in Titanium, ENERGY STAR, Silver
304691910.Description: The Electrolux Perfect Steam electric dryer with Predictive Dry has a more precise sensor to protect fabrics from overdrying. Remove wrinkles and quickly refresh items with steam in 10 minutes with Instant Refresh cycle. Quickly dry the items you need most with the 15-Minute Fast Dry. Color: Titanium.

304851035.Title: Panda 3.5 cu. ft. Compact Portable Laundry Dryer, White
304851035.Description: This compact dryer with 13 lbs. cloth capacity/ 3.5 cu. ft. makes it easy to quickly dry clothes, sheets, table linens, and more, without taking up a lot of room--Perfect for small living spaces, such as apartments, dorm, or condos. It is also lightweight enough so you can take it with you in an RV or camping trip. The ETL/CETL-approved, 110-Volt can be plugged anywhere and matches any Panda Portable Washer. Energy save 1500-Watt and features a spacious 3.5 cu. ft. drum, a removable interior lint filter, and a user-friendly control panel. Choose drying time, from 20 to 200 minutes. A wall-hanging bracket comes included, can be wall mounted. With rear-venting, can be vented, or recirculating under general room condition where sits close to the window. Or, buy and apply with the extra indoor venting kit. Since it's 110V, it may take longer to dry than a regular dryer of 220-Volt. This dryer does not need any installation, except to connect the exhaust vent pipe for venting. It is the electric dryer,110-Volt, with regular 3 prongs power cords. Customers just need to plug it into the regular power socket. Color: White.

312429301.Title: LG Electronics 7.4 cu. ft. Smart White Electric Vented Dryer with Sensor Dry
312429301.Description: Forget pulling still-damp loads from the dryer with Sensor Dry, the dryer can detect moisture and automatically adjust drying time for loads of all sizes saving energy with less wear and tear on clothes. You can even save time with ultra large capacity that fits more clothes in every load. Plus, keep your dryer clean, efficient and safe with the FlowSense Duct Clogging Indicator that lets you know when your ducts need cleaning to avoid lint buildup, improves the dryers performance for greater efficiency and lower utility bills and gives you safer, worry-free operation with fewer service calls. Color: White.

312440605.Title: LG Electronics 7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large White Smart Electric Vented Dryer with Sensor Dry & Wi-Fi Enabled
312440605.Description: Tired of toggling through endless cycles only to have clothes come out damp or overdry. This dryer takes out the guesswork, with built-in intelligence that uses advanced sensors and AI technology to automatically select the right drying motions, temperatures and more. It can even talk to your washer to select a compatible cycle - so you don't have to. What could be easier, use the ThinQ app to start or stop the dryer from anywhere, and even receive an alert when clothes are dry. Durable and stylish tempered glass door with white or silver accents adds the perfect finish.

313846237.Title: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Electric Dryer with Sensor Dryer (Pedestals Sold Separately)
313846237.Description: Samsung's new dryers have advanced features like Sensor Dry, which optimizes cycle time and temperature to thoroughly dry without damaging your clothes. Also, with 7.5 cu. ft. capacity and 10 preset drying cycles, you can do fewer loads in less time and fulfill almost every drying need. Color: White.

316130469.Title: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. 240-Volt Ivory Electric Dryer with Smart Dial and Super Speed Dry, ENERGY STAR
316130469.Description: Samsung's new Smart Dial front load dryer learns your preferred cycles and settings and saves them for quick access in a simplified, easy to use control panel. Dry a full load of laundry in just 30 minutes with Super Speed Dry. Eliminate 99.9% of germs and bacteria(2) on clothing with Steam Sanitize. Based on using Super Speed cycle with an 8 lbs. load. Based on internal testing and independently verified by Intertek. Individual results may vary. Color: Ivory.

308240418.Title: Maytag 7.3 cu. ft. 240-Volt Metallic Slate Stackable Electric Vented Dryer with Steam, ENERGY STAR
308240418.Description: When heavy jeans get mixed in the dryer with thin shirts, push the Extra Power button to help get thick fabrics, pockets, hems and seams drier the first time. This feature helps prevent under drying mixed loads by adding extra time to any cycle. Look for steam-enhanced cycles and options to help prevent wrinkles, refresh clothes and reduce static. Dry a small load fast with the Quick Dry cycle, which pairs nicely with the Quick Wash cycle on select Maytag washers to get clothes ready in no time. Results may vary based on load size and type. Color: Metallic Slate.

306182174.Title: Panda 3.5 cu. ft. 110-Volt White and Black Compact Portable Electric Laundry Dryer, 13 lbs. Capacity
306182174.Description: The Panda 3.5 cu. ft. Compact Dryer is the right choice for you and your family. It is a space-saving design which makes your laundry easy and simple. It is compact which is perfect for smaller laundry loads, you can use it in apartment, dorms, RVs, and it also can be the second dryer in your house. It features a large see-through window. Stainless Steel drum is durable and resists rust and chipping. It has a removable interior lint filter and a user-friendly control panel. Choose drying time, from 20 to 200 minutes. A wall-hanging bracket comes included, can be wall mounted. Regular 3 prongs 110 Voltage can be plugged anywhere, 1500 Watts of motor rate which may take a little longer to dry the clothes, but it saves the electricity bills. Color: White and Black.

314379358.Title: LG Electronics 7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Black Steel Smart Electric Vented Dryer with Sensor Dry, TurboSteam & Wi-Fi Enabled
314379358.Description: Save time and look your best with a dryer that maximizes efficiency. With 7.4 cu. ft. of ultra large capacity and SmartThinQ technology, you can fit more in each load and control key features from your phone. So laundry day becomes your day. Plus, get ready faster with TurboSteam technology that removes wrinkles in a snap. Color: Black Steel.

309167677.Title: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. White Electric Dryer with Steam
309167677.Description: Advanced features like Steam Sanitize+ eliminate 99.9% of germs and bacteria1, while Multi-Steam technology relaxes and smooths away wrinkles from everyday wear. 308088976.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240 Volt Black Shadow Stackable Smart Electric Vented Dryer with Remote Start, ENERGY STAR
308088976.Description: Care never stops. That's why the Whirlpool smart front load dryer helps you stay in control and connected from anywhere. For details and privacy info., visit whirlpool.com/connect.). Color: Black Shadow.

309170359.Description: Enabled with Bixby, an AI-powered laundry care assistant, Samsungs 7.5 cu. ft. front load dryer helps you choose the best cycle option and notifies you on your smartphone1when your cycle is complete. Steam Sanitize+ eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria2, while Multi-Steam technology relaxes and smooths away wrinkles from everyday wear. Sensor Dry optimizes cycle time and temperature to thoroughly dry without damaging your clothes. 312831101.Title: Electrolux IQ-Touch 24 in. 4.0 cu. ft. White Electric Ventless Dryer, ENERGY STAR
312831101.Description: Get the perfect clean with the Electrolux 24 in. Front Load Dryer with IQ-Touch Electronic Controls. This is a condensation and ventless dryer. It features a reversible door that offers flexibility for compact spaces, making it easy to transfer clothes from the washer to the dryer. There are 12 drying cycles that include a wrinkle release and delicate cycle to reduce tangling/wrinkling of clothes and improve overall performance. This unit is eco-friendly and does not recycle heat from your home. Color: White.

309245968.Title: DECO 3.5 cu. ft. White Electric Dryer with Stainless Steel Drum
309245968.Description: More life. Less laundry. The Deco Dryer 850.Consider the Dryer 850 compact dryer your ultimate clothes-drying solution. Equipped with auto dry/timed dry technology and a built-in wrinkle guard, this dryer will leave your clothes ready to wear and wrinkle-free. At just 26.5 x 23.5 x 21.5 (in.) (HxWxD), the ultra-compact Dryer 850 is built to fit into even the smallest spaces,which makes it a popular choice for families living in apartments, condos, tiny homes and more.The Dryer 850 dryer maximizes your laundry efficiency, without compromising drying speed or design. At just 26.5 x 23.5 x 21.5 (in.) (HxWxD) when stacked , this compact machine is built to fit into the smallest spaces, whether its a condo, apartment or non-traditional laundry area. Dry your clothes to perfection with auto dry/timed dry options that leave garments ready-to- wear and wrinkle-free, and feel the difference of the Dryer 850s high-speed, fast-drying turbo fan. And if youre doing laundry in a non-traditional space, theres even more to love. This convertible dryer changes from venting to condensing mode in a few simple steps, and can be paired with an innovative venting bucket to create a vented system-even without vents. With a door safety switch, 180-degree opening door and premium steel drum, you can rest assured that your dryer is built with your familys safety and convenience in mind. Color: White.

312440282.Title: LG Electronics 7.4 cu. ft. White Ultra Large Capacity Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry, Turbo Steam
312440282.Description: Meet the intelligent dryer that helps you save time and enhances fabric care, all at the same time. Built-in intelligence automatically selects the right drying motions, temperatures and more, and even talks to your washer to select a compatible cycle-making it the ultimate laundry hack. A wall-hanging bracket comes included, can be wall mounted. Regular 3 prongs 110 Voltage can be plugged anywhere, 1400-Watt of motor rate which may take a little longer to dry the clothes, but it saves the electricity bills. Color: White.

312563957.Title: GE 7.8 cu. ft. Smart 240-Volt Diamond Gray Stackable Electric Vented Dryer with Sanitize Cycle, ENERGY STAR
312563957.Description: At GE Appliances, we bring good things to life, by designing and building the world's best appliances. Our goal is to help people improve their lives at home by providing quality appliances that were made for real life. Whether it's enjoying the tradition of making meals from scratch or tackling a mountain of muddy jeans and soccer jerseys, GE Appliances are crafted to support any and every task in the home. Color: Diamond Gray.

313658202.Title: CrossOver Commercial Laundry 7 cu. ft. Stainless Steel Electric Dryer Coin-Operated, Silver
313658202.Description: Strength, durability, and performance are at the center of the newly refined CrossOver commercial laundry 2.0 by Wascomat. Built with professional grade components and loaded with powerful features, our small chassis front-load dryer combines innovative technology, energy efficiency, and proven Wascomat reliability for optimal results every time. The highly efficient axial airflow system and tight construction results in extremely low energy usage and faster drying times. Innovative support rollers improve drum stability, ensure quiet operation, and extend the life of the machine. CrossOver 2.0 dryers are easily programmable with promotional vend pricing at specified times and days. Multiple promotion events can be programmed at one time using the built-in real time clock. CrossOver 2.0 - in a class by itself. Color: stainless steel.

315280951.Title: Bosch 300 Series 4 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Stackable Electric Ventless Condensate Compact Dryer, ENERGY STAR
315280951.Description: Spacious and efficient, Bosch's compact 24 in. ventless dryer seamlessly integrates into any laundry space either stacked or side-by-side. Condensation drying uses an eco-friendly solution to efficiently dry clothes at an optimal temperature without the need for external ducting. This saves you the cost of running ducting as well as the space behind the dryer needed for flexible duct connections. Color: White.

308241660.Title: Maytag 7.3 cu. ft. 240-Volt White Stackable Electric Vented Dryer with Quick Dry Cycle, ENERGY STAR
308241660.Description: When heavy jeans get mixed in the dryer with thin shirts, push the Extra Power button to help get thick fabrics, pockets, hems and seams drier the first time. This feature helps prevent under drying mixed loads by adding extra time to any cycle. Advanced Moisture Sensing monitors inside moisture and air temperatures to help evenly dry loads. Dry a small load fast with the Quick Dry cycle, which pairs nicely with the Quick Wash cycle on select Maytag washers to get clothes ready in no time. Results may vary based on load size and type. Color: White.

304700461.Title: Electrolux 8.0 cu. ft. Front Load Perfect Steam Electric Dryer in White
304700461.Description: The Electrolux Perfect Steam electric dryer keeps clothes looking their best with moisture sensor. Quickly dry the items you need most with the 20-Minute Fast Dry. Use the Perfect Steam wrinkle release to gently release wrinkles and reduce static from your fabrics. Color: White.

304700069.Title: Electrolux 8.0 cu. ft. White Electric Dryer with Steam, Predictive Dry, ENERGY STAR
304700069.Description: The Electrolux Perfect Steam electric dryer with Predictive Dry has a more precise sensor to protect fabrics from overdrying. Remove wrinkles and quickly refresh items with steam in 10 minutes with Instant Refresh cycle. Quickly dry the items you need most with the 15-Minute Fast Dry. Color: White.

308241988.Title: Whirlpool 7.4 cu. ft. 240 Volt Stackable White Electric Ventless Dryer with Intuitive Touch Controls, ENERGY STAR
308241988.Description: Care is being flexible. That's why we help you do laundry in a way that fits your needs. Help prevent overdrying your family's fabrics with Advanced Moisture Sensing and keep wrinkles from setting in with Wrinkle Shield option. Plus, Intuitive Controls choose what you want to dry based on your load type and let the machine choose the best way to do it. Color: White.

305517758.Title: Panda 3.5 cu.ft. 110-Volt Compact Portable Electric Laundry Dryer, White and Black
305517758.Description: The Panda 3.5 cu. ft. Compact Dryer is the right choice for you and your family. It is a space-saving design which makes your laundry easy and simple. It is compact which is perfect for smaller laundry loads, you can use it in apartment, dorms, RVs, and it also can be the second dryer in your house. It features a large see-through window. Stainless Steel drum is durable and resists rust and chipping. It has a removable interior lint filter and a user-friendly control panel. Choose drying time, from 20 to 200 minutes. Enhanced with an option of auto sensor function. A wall-hanging bracket comes included, can be wall mounted. Regular 3 prongs 110-Volt can be plugged anywhere, 1500-Watt of motor rate which may take a little longer to dry the clothes, but it saves the electricity bills. Color: White.

311102573.Title: Haier 4.3 cu. ft. Smart 240 Volt White Stackable Electric Vented Dryer, ENERGY STAR
311102573.Description: GE appliances provide up-to-date technology and exceptional quality to simplify the way you live. With a timeless appearance, this family of appliances is ideal for your family. And, coming from one of the most trusted names in America, you know that this entire selection of appliances is as advanced as it is practical. Color: White.

206984121.Title: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Steam in Black Stainless, ENERGY STAR, Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel
206984121.Description: This Samsung Electric Dryer is an eco-friendly, 2016 ENERGY STAR-certified dryer with 14 preset drying cycles. It features a large 7.5 cu. ft. capacity that allows you to quickly do more laundry in a single load. Best of all, you'll spend less time ironing and less money at the dry cleaner's with the Multi-Steam feature that helps remove wrinkles and odors while freshening your clothes. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel.

312439652.Title: LG Electronics 7.4 cu. ft. Ultra Large Capacity Black Steel Smart Electric Vented Dryer with Sensor Dry, TurboSteam & Wi-Fi Enabled
312439652.Description: No longer just a companion to your washer, LG dryers deliver a new level of convenience and clothing care. When there's no time to wash, TurboSteam technology reduces wrinkles in just 10 minutes. Built-in intelligence automatically selects the right settings to eliminate the guesswork, and can even talk to your washer to pick a compatible cycle. Smart features let you start the dryer when you're on the go or send routine maintenance updates to keep your appliance in tip-top shape. All with a sleek design and scratch-resistant tempered glass door with chrome accent rim for lasting good looks. Color: Black Steel.
